saltmarsh 0.0.0.9000

Check that each source file exists on the result directory and is up to date

Source: R/check_files.R
check_files.Rd

Check that each source file exists on the result directory and is up to date

Usage

check_files(files, gd, sourcedir, resultdir)

Arguments

files

Vector of files to check

gd

Source Drive info (optional), named list of

  • dir Google directory info, from get_dir

  • sourcedrive which source drive (local, google, or sftp)

  • sftp list(url, user)

sourcedir

Origin directory of files

resultdir

Target directory of files - see if origin files are here and up to date

Value

A vector corresponding to files, TRUE for those that are up to date

On this page
